snippet: Secretary Ashton Carter spoke at a security conference about the F.B.I.-Apple dispute over access to an iPhone, but avoided taking sides.
abstract: Defense Sec Ashton B Carter tells computer security experts at RSA Conference he does not support 'back door' that would grant government access to data protected by encryption; avoids taking sides in iPhone dispute between Federal Bureau of Investigation and Apple.
lead_paragraph: Secretary Ashton Carter spoke at a security conference about the F.B.I.-Apple dispute over access to an iPhone, but avoided taking sides.

headline.main: Defense Secretary Takes Position Against a Data ‘Back Door’
headline.print_headline: Defense Secretary Says He’s Not in Favor of a Data ‘Back Door’

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: RSA, The Security Division of EMC Corporation
